titles.title: O For A Heart To Praise My God (Charles Wesley)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh for a heart to praise my God, A heart from sin set free, A heart that always feels Thy blood So freely shed for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A heart resigned, submissive, meek, My great Redeemerâ€™s throne, Where only Christ is heard to speak, Where Jesus reigns alone.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A humble, lowly, contrite heart, Believing, true, and clean, Which neither life nor death can part From Christ who dwells within.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A heart in every thought renewed And full of love divine, Perfect and right and pure and good, A copy, Lord, of Thine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
